content.label: What is the wingsuits?
i payed $5 for an app that glitches constantly and freezes before i can even get to 500m, so like 20 seconds of playing. don‚Äôt waste your money

Let‚Äôs me gets within very few points of the required 100000
To finish level 53 and always something goes haywire that shouldn‚Äôt    Not a relaxing or peaceful game. Just makes you angry.  Shouldn‚Äôt be so hard

title.label: Great game but lots of bugs

content.label: Really a great sequel to the original with enough changes to keep it feeling new. My biggest problem is the number of bugs I encounter that I never saw on Alto‚Äôs Adventure. Jumping off a large hill with the lemur chasing you often ends up with the lemur appearing to run through the air. Today everything on the screen disappeared except for the score until eventually the player crashed at which point it got stuck in a loop of in game messages and haptic feedback. If they could fix the bugs it would be so much more enjoyable.
Love the graphics and the added features, but there is clearly a bug with the sound, because no matter what I do, I‚Äôm riding in silence. I certainly hope it will be fixed in the next update.

I know this game is a few years old and you probably have a new project to work on, but it would be so awesome if you could add more goals for those of us who have completed them all and still want to keep going :) You could make them ridiculously difficult (or not) but it would be so great to keep having something to work towards!!

title.label: One of the best series I‚Äôve ever played

content.label: This game is so beautiful and fun. You can create seemingly endless combos and there‚Äôs quite a lot of creativity when it comes to them. The music paired with the simple yet breathtaking graphics makes the game unforgettable. I‚Äôve completed this whole game making it to level 61. The only complaint I might have is that once you get to the final level, there are no more challenges and you only play to have fun. Also coins don‚Äôt matter that much after you‚Äôve unlocked everything unless you want to buy stuff to let you continue your run in which case you can just play zen mode instead unless you want to beat your high score

This is a good game and is overall enjoyable. However I had to give up after only reaching level 33 or so. I can‚Äôt get one of the goals even after trying probably a hundred times and spending several hours on it, much more than any other goal.

Some of the goals (like the one I‚Äôm stuck on) seem to be driven by chance, and so you have to either get lucky, or go far to meet them. After being stuck for so long, the minor issues can also become frustrating... like even though the game is gorgeous, it‚Äôs hard to see the character and rocks at night or in the rain. Or when you do a jump or backflip, occasionally you‚Äôll wind up in a chasm that was offscreen when you started.

Hopefully for future versions or products the developers can make the goals less driven by chance, and make the game easier to see, especially at night. In a lot of ways I‚Äôd like it if the level was the same every run, instead of having it be different.

Overall it‚Äôs a pretty fun game though.

This game has glitching out constantly as of late. I completed everything, but seems that about every other time I play, there will be an instance where I hit a rock while grinding and the game glitches out. All of the graphics disappear and it just becomes a blank screen, then I crash because I can‚Äôt see anything, then the game starts playing at about 1/2 fps and I have to close the game and reopen it for it to go back to normal. 

Please fix this or I will probably lose interest in this game.

I was hesitant at first seeing its $8 or so price tag, and thought that it wouldn‚Äôt be much different than Altos adventure. But I was so wrong! Once I got my hands on my pair of headphones, this game gave me a serene experience like no other. The locations are wonderful, but the top things about this game were the sound design and the graphics. Every little note played perfectly matched the calming mood that the game made. And every little bird, pond, plant life like the desert flower, and the ruins are paired along with the music to make the true perfect experience. It makes me wonder, if Team Alto can top this game!

I sucked at this game at first, but after playing for days I got a lot better and finally can play well enough to stay interested. It has become SO addicting. I love the music, the landscapes, the graphics, the tricks... Always have a lot of fun and it‚Äôs a great way to pass the time. THANK YOU for making it a free game for the moment when I finally downloaded it! Before then I would only play it when I went to the Apple Store lol
The game is laggy on my iPhone 11

title.label: Great game with gorgeous graphics( w/ bug report)

content.label: Character in wing suit state can dive into underground sometimes.

title.label: Good game but could be better

content.label: Overall, I love the game but it suffers from the same shortcomings as its sister game in terms of creating unnecessary frustration that detracts from the fun of playing. For example, don‚Äôt randomly place the radio where there is no possibility of getting it or have the barrels drop so close that there is no possibility of getting them. Likewise with the rocks, they need to be placed where they can be reasonably avoided. Otherwise, the experience just becomes repetitive and annoying.

That guy is nice
That and if you use the wing suit before you land on your head it can save you and helps you get over the caroms if you go to fast!

Having played Alto‚Äôs Adventure, I really like this sequel... my only complaint is that orienting the rider‚Äôs landing in the dark is very, very difficult in this game. There are no cues to whether the rider is landing upright when the sun isn‚Äôt out, or if there are, I can‚Äôt discern them.

Hello! Hope you are doing fine!! I just want to let you know that the game freeze while I‚Äôm talking over the phone and playing at the same time. I have been playing this game for a while but the only thing is that. Overall is good.
Fun game with interesting and new objectives. However, I notice frame rate issues on my iPhone 11 that I don‚Äôt seem to experience with other games.

The game is great I love the gameplay, graphics and music. The only problem I have with it is that it has frame rate issues on my iPhone 11. Developers please fix it it would make the experience so much better.

This is one of the most wonderful gaming experiences I‚Äôve ever had. The graphics are beautiful, the music is exquisite and the whole experience is just perfect. While being extremely calming this game also manages to excite and thrill at the same time.

This game is a lot of fun. Simple controls, but a rich experience. I wish it had a "day only" mode because it's less fun to play when it's too dark to see the details. "Watch out for that rock!" I would if I could tell it was there.

I was looking for a game as immersive and calming as Monument Valley...and friends, this isn‚Äôt it. It‚Äôs pretty, but bland, aggravating., and not terribly engaging. Just meh. I‚Äôm sorry I spent $5 on this.
Great app, lots of fun to play and very relaxing
This game is visually stunning. It makes you feel calm and chill. The obstacles that you can use are really fun, especially the ‚Äúwall ride ‚Äú. 11 out of 10 for meüòÉüèÇ

This could be a good game if the software was more responsive to touchscreen. When I try to do flips or jumps, the character stutters and doesn‚Äôt complete. I don‚Äôt have problems with this in other games. I‚Äôm using iPad air4.

I remember very clearly... when I first got this game, I nearly cried. It is so peaceful, and beautiful, the colors are amazing, the features are really cool, and the desert...! The music is beautiful!!!
Anyone who wanted a calming game should definitely play this.

Another thing that makes this game so unique is the weather. There‚Äôs rain and thunderstorms and sandstorms, but they actually are lifelike! The thunder comes after the lightning, and so on. Have you noticed there‚Äôs even eclipses! So well thought out... it really shows how much thought the creators put into this game. I love the biomes, and the water and balloon and sand and temples. The characters are so lovely too, and you can unlock such cool levels and features (like the wingsuit!) And the fact that you can see lemurs and birds of paradise(they‚Äôre sooo pretty!) makes this game really, really beautiful. 

I love this game so much. Even picking it up and playing one round makes you so happy and calm. The desert is endless, and beautiful. Thank you to the creators and devs! I love this game‚ù§Ô∏è

I have to say that the game is delightful and enjoyable but if I have a recommendation it would be: DONT get the wingsuit. The implementation of this feature is so lame: it cost a LOT of effort to get the coin for it and then you have to grind a ton of tricks to activate it only for a little while! And if you die it goes away until you grind a whole bunch of tricks AGAIN. Not good. For the amount of effort it takes, once you acquire it, it should be yours to use and activate as you see fit. That‚Äôs my big gripe with the game. I like everything else and it‚Äôs pretty nice to play. But that wingsuit...grrrr.
I don't know why. I don't know if it still is. All I know is that this is a great game, and I would've paid money if I had a bank account (I'm 14, it's not weird).

title.label: Why does this game cost money still?

content.label: I don‚Äôt know why this game costs money, there‚Äôs not much to it. I know at one point it was the best game on the AppStore but not anymore. This game is a good game though it‚Äôs very calming and I feel it should be free to everyone. THANKYOU. Overall this game is great but it‚Äôs not worth 5$ out of my bank account.
I would love to play this on my iPod, but every time I open this app it exits out of it. It works great on my iPad though. Additionally, Alto‚Äôs Oddesy works well on my iPod and iPad.

This is such a great game,, perfect in all aspects! Never gets boring! It‚Äôs so cool and they don‚Äôt target ads at you!! No ads, to be exact! GET THIS NOWüòçüòçüòçüòç

I really enjoy this game, and have been playing it for over a year. The one thing I am still waiting in from it as of now is a Coronavirus alert. Both the small thing a and the big things matter, and I hope the developers will sue there best to help.

This game is great. First of all is free which is a plus. Second it is a huge improvement on the first. Third the environment is beautiful and captivating. Fourth the music is so great especially in zen mode. There is hard work and effort from the devs oozing in every millimeter of the game; it‚Äôs clear that the devs were only concerned with making an amazing game not making money unlike most other games here which are littered with adds and micro-transactions. So over all 10 out of 10 would play again, this game is top-tier, a chefs kiss.

I really like this game don‚Äôt get me wrong. But I have noticed serious problems in passing levels. I will be doing the action it‚Äôs calling for but the game will not say I completed it. And this keeps happening and I‚Äôve restarted the game and it still happened and of different levels. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating and I will probably delete the app if it‚Äôs never fixed
It‚Äôs an amazing game that I love playing. But I had a lot of progress on my old phone and then moved to another phone. Is there anyway to transfer data from one phone to another?

I love this game way more than the original Alto‚Äôs Adventure. It‚Äôs so hard to make a game be relaxing but not boring. This game however, has the perfect balance. 

My home town is in deserts and this game brings me back to the good old days when I lived there. The background is so enchanting. Everything from the thunder to sandstorms are extremely beautiful and nostalgic. 

Thank you so much for this beautiful game üíô

title.label: Thanks for the limited time offer

content.label: I just downloaded it and it is so hard to put down. If you have not downloaded it then do it NOW.

I enjoyed Alto‚Äôs Adventure. It has simple mechanics and it‚Äôs the sort of game you can pick whenever you have an extra 5-10 minutes to spare. Simple, pretty and fun.

Odyssey improves upon what was already great. The backgrounds are livelier and the dynamic range is fantastic. While it doesn‚Äôt have HDR10 support you wouldn‚Äôt know it when playing with the brightness maxed. The sunrise and sunset look spectacular.
I love this game ! It has 0 adds and no bugs.very appropriate for young kids.all ages FUN!i‚Äôm out,see you!
Incredibly calming game. The zen mode is my favorite after a long stressful day. My favorite thing about this game is NO ADS!
The game is nice and I liked its predecessor but since I have reached The Temples, it crashes constantly after a few seconds of play. It has become unplayable.

content.label: There needs to be a update because the trick score it shows you your non top score it shows you the last trick scoreWhich I do not like.So They need to show The real top score.üëªand yaüòâ
I love the game so much, the music and the controls are fun and easy and the game never glitches! I recommend this game.

It‚Äôs hard to see during the day because there‚Äôs not enough differentiation between actual obstacles and the background scenery. At night, it‚Äôs almost impossible to see Alto. Additionally, the game zooming in and out every time you jump, the bird that follows you right above your head that is the same size as Alto, and the (to my memory) smaller size of Alto just add up to a very visually frustrating experience. It‚Äôs just hard to make out what‚Äôs happening on screen. 

I really liked the first game, and wanted to like this too, it‚Äôs just hard to focus on the playing when you can‚Äôt really see anything. I can‚Äôt imagine how visually impaired people could play this. Maybe all this is because I‚Äôm playing on a phone, and it‚Äôs different on an iPad, I don‚Äôt know. 

I completed Alto 1, and I appreciate the added game elements of the sequel; of course the music is fantastic as usual. I just didn‚Äôt find this sequel to be as accessible as the first due to the visual problems laid out above. I eagerly look forward to the next release from this game developer, whether it be another ‚ÄúAlto‚Äù installment or something new entirely.

I just wanted to thank the developers for offering this game for free during this strange and stressful time, not just for our country, but for the world. Speaking of stress, that‚Äôs where the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúZen Mode‚Äù comes in handy, and also the mode I play most. 

Thank you again.
ITS FREE NOW THANK U PEOPLE

I love this game it‚Äôs my go too on both my iPhone and iPad Pro. However on my 11‚Äù iPad Pro the game hitches and stutters with minor frame drops, this happens with both pro motion on and off. It can make the game unenjoyable to play at time. While the games graphics are very pleasing I doubt they are so demanding that the 7 core GPU is under so much stress it can‚Äôt output a smooth amount of frames.

If you could optimize it that would be great!
Play it. I didn‚Äôt regret it, neither will you.
